1.0.2.en: Updated store information and improved flow cards.

1.1.0.en: Commands are now batched per 500ms to prevent filling up the queue.

1.2.0.en: Bugfixes and updated minimum Homey version to >=12.0.0

1.2.1.en: Added conditional flows for temperature related capabilities.

1.2.4.en: Improved stability when commands were send too fast. Improved logging.

1.3.3.en: Added manual IP device setting. Increased refresh interval.
